name: Update to armbian stable v20.08 (Caple)
body: **Notice**: This will is the last release using python2 next releases will migrate to python3
- Fix citrico-config to hide kilipper if not installed

name: Update to armbian stable v20.11
body:
Bump to stable armbian v20.11
Runtime migrated to python3
**Note:**New HSL streaming of octoPi is not incluided as octoPi 0.18 is still no stable


## New boards:
 - Added orange PI PC+
 - Added BananaPI M2
 - Added Rock64


## Builder:
 - Vagrant build uses now ubuntu focal 64 box.
 - Updated base packages including libatlas3-base for numpy wheel usage
 - Added piwheels source to pip to speed up builds

name: Update to octopi v0.18
body:
Updated stable armbian v21.02
Bump to new version of octopi 0.18: Improved camera support & bugfix
Added v4linux-utils for camera troubleshouting
Other minor changes


## New boards:
 - Added orange PI Lite


 This release do not include ROCK64

name: Update to armbian 21.05
body:
Updated stable armbian v21.05
fixed reboot with systemctl for shutdow #13
other minor changes


## New boards:

 - Added orange PI One Plus - WIP


 This release does not include ROCK64 image

name: Update to bullseye and armbian 22.02
body:
Distro update current debian (bullseye)
Updated to stable amrbia v22.05


## New boards:

 -Added Orange Pi Zero 2 - edge kernel branch

name: Update to armbian 22.11 + HA proxy fix
body: Improve docker support in build script
- Added current stable to Orange Pi Zero 2 (WIP)

name: Update to OctoPi 1.0.0 with armbian 23.02
body: Fix build to build other user name different name than pi
Added custom ffnpeg support for HLS streaming (experimental)
